description: SSP-based RCP scenario following approximately RCP7.0 global forcing pathway but with reduced NTCF emissions. SSP3 socioeconomic conditions.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 1, scenario,  SSP3, RCP7.0, reduced NTCF,  Near Term Climate Forcers,

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the mid 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2055 41yrs

requirements.description: Impose changing concentrations of RCP7.0 long-lived gases, including CO2, N2O and halogenated gases.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, Well-mixed Greenhouse Gas, CO2
requirements.label: RCP70 Well Mixed GHG

requirements.description: Impose changing concentrations of reduced RCP7.0 Near Term Climate Forcers (NTCF). Beginning in 2014 with air quality policies (or maximum feasible reductions) applied to the SSP3-7 NTCF emissions.
requirements.label: ReducedRCP70NTCF

requirements.description: Impose changing RCP7.0 land use including crops, pasture, urban area, vegetation and forest.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, Land Use
requirements.label: RCP70 Land Use

requirements.description: An ensemble of upto three simulations
requirements.keywords: upto three, upto 3, ensemble, runs, simulations
requirements.label: UptoThree

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
requirements.label: HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with chemistry
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, Chemistry, AOGCM-Chem, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model
requirements.label: AOGCM-Chem Configuration
